room_00: The only way is forward. There's the exit!
npc_01_dialogue_a: I'm Jikenwa. I'm a weird person. Why? My only purpose is to tell you that each key corresponds to a locked gate with the same color. Bye now.
npc_01_dialogue_b: It’s me again. Jikenwa. I thought I heard a beast roar. * It found you! * Oh, you pacified it? Good job. Go on ahead. I’m gonna check on my friend. I hope she’s all right...
